author: Tyler Olson
title: GOP rep introducing bill to expose China to potential US litigation on coronavirus
description: The bill would remove China's jurisdictional immunity in American courts if it discharges a bioweapon that harms Americans.
content:
Get the latest news on coronavirus and more delivered daily to your inbox. Sign up here.
Rep. Jason Gooden, R-Texas, is introducing a bill Friday targeting China over the coronavirus outbreak that would open it up to potential litigation in American courts i… [+3728 chars]
